title: Ep 154: (Still) The Godfather of Hair with Garren
itunes:title: Ep 154: (Still) The Godfather of Hair with Garren
itunes:subtitle: Hairdresser Garren, the co-founder of R+Co who has styled everyone from Audrey Hepburn to Oprah, explains how he got his start, offers up tips for bringing the glamour, and tells us what *not* to do with a curling iron. We also recap our listener party...
description:
Hairdresser Garren, the co-founder of R+Co who has styled everyone from Audrey Hepburn to Oprah, explains how he got his start, offers up tips for bringing the glamour, and tells us what *not* to do with a curling iron. We also recap our listener party with Davines, share must-know info about the cult-favorite exfoliating solution Biologique Recherche P50 Lotion, and give you some tips for dealing with over-exfoliated and compromised skin. 

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
